member.name: T:Testing.Commons.NUnit.ArrangingTest`1
member.summary: Eases the "arrange" part of AAA tests
member.remarks: Already annotated with the which means that inheritors do not need to specify it again.
member.typeparam: Type of the subject (aka. SUT) of the test.

member.name: M:Testing.Commons.NUnit.ArrangingTest`1.Arrange
member.summary: Invokes the "arrange" part of a AAA test.
member.remarks: Annotated with the which means that it will be run before each test.

member.summary: Invokes the "cleanup" part after every test.
member.remarks: Annotated with the which means that it will be run after each test.

member.name: M:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.MustExtensions.Json(Testing.Commons.Must.BeEntryPoint,System.String)
member.summary: Builds an instance of that allows assertions using compact JSON strings.
member.remarks:
A compact JSON string notation uses single quotes for names and string values instead of double quotes, removing the need to escape such double quotes.
A non-compact JSON string uses the canonical double quote style for names an string values.
member.param: Extension entry point.
The expected value in JSON compact notation.

member.name: T:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.JsonEqualConstraint
member.summary: Extends allowing asserting using compact JSON strings.
member.remarks:
A compact JSON string notation uses single quotes for names and string values instead of double quotes, removing the need to escape such double quotes.
An expanded JSON string uses the canonical double quote style for names an string values.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.remarks:
A compact JSON string notation uses single quotes for names and string values instead of double quotes, removing the need to escape such double quotes.
An extended JSON string uses the canonical double quote style for names an string values.

member.name: M:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.JsonExtensions.AsJson(NUnit.Framework.Constraints.EqualConstraint)
member.summary: Flags the constraint to use the supplied compact JSON string when performing equality.
member.param: The constraint to modify.

member.name: T:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.MatchingConstraint
member.summary: Allows matching partial expected objects.
member.remarks: It is a useful feature when it is easier to create a object with the same shape and a subset of the values as the actual object.

member.name: T:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.ExposingWriter

member.name: T:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1
member.summary: Provides standard operators over a single type

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1.Equal
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary equality (==) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1.NotEqual
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary inequality (!=) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1.GreaterThan
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary greater-then (>) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1.LessThan
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary less-than (<) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1.GreaterThanOrEqual
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary greater-than-or-equal (>=) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`1.LessThanOrEqual
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary less-than-or-equal (<=) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: T:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`2
member.summary: Provides standard operators that operate over operands of different types.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`2.Equal
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary equality (==) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`2.NotEqual
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary inequality (!=) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary greater-then (>) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`2.LessThan
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary less-than (<) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`2.GreaterThanOrEqual
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary greater-than-or-equal (>=) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.

member.name: P:Testing.Commons.NUnit.Constraints.Support.Operator`2.LessThanOrEqual
member.summary: Returns a delegate to evaluate binary less-than-or-equal (<=) for the given type; this delegate will throw an InvalidOperationException if the type T does not provide this operator, or for Nullable<TInner> if TInner does not provide this operator.
